member.name: IDelegateFolder.SetItemAlloc
member.summary: Provides the delegate folder an interface used to allocate and free item IDs.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDelegateFolder
member.summary: Exposes a method through which a delegate folder is given the interface required to allocate and free item IDs.
